sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './DailyScorePopup.scss'; const DailyScorePopup = ({ dailyData }) => { if (!dailyData || !dailyData.aggregated_data) { return

No daily data available.

; // Handle case when data is not available } // Destructure and provide fallback values for all relevant metrics, including handling NaN const { 'Speed(km/h)': speedKmh = 'N/A', 'Acceleration(m/s^2)': acceleration = 'N/A', 'Jerk(m/s^3)': jerk = 'N/A', 'Braking_Intensity': brakingIntensity = 'N/A', 'SASV': sasv = 'N/A', 'Speed_Violation': speedViolation = 'N/A', 'Heading_Change(degrees)': headingChange = 'N/A' } = dailyData.aggregated_data || {}; // Use optional chaining and defaults // Handle NaN values by converting them to "N/A" const formattedJerk = isNaN(jerk) ? 'N/A' : jerk; return (

Daily Driving Summary

Driving Score

{dailyData.driving_score || 'N/A'} / 100

Driving Category

{dailyData.driving_category || 'N/A'}

Total Distance Covered

{dailyData.total_distance_covered_km || 'N/A'} km

Average Speed

{speedKmh} km/h

Acceleration

{acceleration} m/s²

Jerk

{formattedJerk} m/s³

{/* Handling NaN */}

Braking Intensity

{brakingIntensity}

Heading Change

{headingChange} degrees

Speed Violations

{speedViolation}

SASV (Sudden Acceleration/Speed Violation)

{sasv}

); }; export default DailyScorePopup;
